TEXT.TITLE: SYSTEMHOUSE INC <SHKIF> WINS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Systemhouse Inc said it has been awarded a 12 mln dlr contract by the County of Los Angeles to design and develop its integrated County Justice Information System. Systemhouse also said it has opened a branch in Los Angeles, as a direct result of the contract. Reuter
